Package jetbrains.mps.vfs.refresh

Interface CachingFile

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IFile
    public interface CachingFile
extends IFile
    An implementing class is supposed to cache (in its own way) the tangible information about files on disk (e.g. file hierarchy). The contract is as follows: The CachingFile instance contains the information about the specific file on disk. The information might be or might be not actual. The method refresh(jetbrains.mps.vfs.refresh.CachingContext) is supposed to update the current status of the file Created by apyshkin on 17/06/16.
